name: Struggle of a tree | GGJ 2023
description:
This is a game made under 48 hours for the GGJ2023 with the theme of roots, where you control the roots of a tree trying desperately to find underground resources to survive.

 Avoid stone clutters that will slow down your progress and try to find underground water deposits as well as fungi to reach your ultimate end goal, the rumored and legendary mineral deposits deep in the earth. 

Use your mouse from left to right of the screen to guide your roots as it grows downwards.

Tileset and palette from this pack by Trixie: https://trixelized.itch.io/kinda-cute-forest

Main tree from this pack by ansimuz: https://ansimuz.itch.io/sunny-land-pixel-game-art
